code: import React from'react';import'./Timer.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Timer(_ref){let{timeRemaining}=_ref;const formatTime=seconds=>{const mins=Math.floor(seconds/60);const secs=seconds%60;return"".concat(mins,":").concat(secs<10?'0':'').concat(secs);};const getTimerClass=()=>{if(timeRemaining<=60)return'critical';if(timeRemaining<=300)return'warning';return'normal';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"timer ".concat(getTimerClass()),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"time-remaining",children:formatTime(timeRemaining)})});}
